name: Gnome 3 like dark theme ALPHA
description: A more or less uniform look to the gnome 3 desktop dark theme
additional_info:
Works on Chrome, currently no experiences about Firefox!
This is an alpha Version! Currently under heavy development! Do not expect that to be productive

*current info: This theme sadly affects the readability of youtube-comments and google+. Better do not use, if you are using google+ and youtube (I am working on it)

Changelog:
0.0.1 - hopefully added the correct domains, added screenshot
0.0.2 (current) - little enhancements for some buttons, fixed top-bar, complete google search engine should look fine now.
